short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to help restaurants earn rewards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See rebated items as you shop online! The South Star Essentials extension plugs right into your browser and allows you to automatically view which items have rebates as you shop on Cheney Central.
